extendedInfo.description: It is very simple to open a door for all of us;It is also very simple to open the screen of your phone.Why?We develop a very simple lock screen app- Simple Lockscreen Door.You only need to open a door to remove the lock screen. About this app:This app is full of creativity. It offers you a new unlocking solution.On this unlocking interface, there is a door.It is not a common door.If you want to remove the lock screen, you must open this door.Besides, you can see your phone battery state, time and date on the door. Operations:There is a bolt on it.You should turn the bolt to open this door. Features:1.  Simple operations:2.  Vivid sound effect. Conclusion:As modern people, you should not wait in line.Instead, you should always try something new.Simple Lockscreen Door will be your right choice.Now this app is free for all.Quick take actions to install it. ################Attention############This app is ads-supported. So it may includessome notification ads or icon ads.#####################################
